content.rendered:
Andy’s room is full of fun! Especially when the owner of the room is away, because when no one is watching them, the games come alive. Woody is the boss, the old warrior, the talking sheriff ragdoll. But there’s also Mr. Potato Face who longs for love, Rex the scary dinosaur, Guba the inquisitive piggy bank, adventurous soldiers, flirty dress-up dolls and the rest. But one day a new companion arrives: Buzz, the hypermodern, interstellar laser warrior. Two bagpipes can’t even fit in a children’s room. Buzz and Woody would soon be enemies if they didn’t accidentally fall out of the window and have to fight the real world together to finally get back to Andy after a hundred adventures, dangers and adversities.

Director: John Lasseter

Writers: John Lasseter. Pete Docter. Andrew Stanton

Stars: Tom Hanks. Tim Allen. Don Rickles
